title.rendered: Continuous Delivery for Kubernetes Apps with Helm & ChartMuseum

content.rendered:
In our latest webinar, Stef Arnold from SUSE CaaS Platform joined Codefresh’s own ChartMuseum creator & in-house rockstar Josh Dolitsky to talk about streamlining the delivery of Kubernetes-based applications using the open-source tools Helm and ChartMuseum.

They showed how to use Helm to package applications as a chart, which is a deployable collection of Kubernetes files. Then, how to release your chart to ChartMuseum, which serves as an artifact repository for Helm charts.

Don’t worry if you missed it, we recorded it for you here:

Watch the Webinar

 

You can also view the slide deck below:

Continuous Delivery for Kubernetes Apps with Helm and ChartMuseum from Codefresh
